titleStmt.title: An additionall ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: concerning dayes of recreation, allowed unto schollers, apprentices and other servants. Die Lunæ 28 Junii. 1647. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Includes: The apprentices petition and propositions, presented unto the Honourable House of Commons .. June 22. 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley.
